title: Windows 8.1 Pro X64 ESD DE-FR-IT Sep 2014
description:
Windows 8.1 Pro X64 ESD DE-FR-IT Sep 2014


[ RELEASE INFO ]

  File:		Win8.1.X64.MULTI3.Sep2014.iso
  
  Source:	X19-50007

  Size: 	3,85GB
  Format: 	Bootable ISO
   
  CRC32: 	227ea7d0
  MD5:		69cdcb4ff1778a964263b8fb6f54437f
  SHA-1: 	a8a6ffdb3a372a26db2a79ef71a431cca37512bc


[ CONTENTS ]

  * Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset 8.1 (Microsoft DaRT)


  Integrated / Pre-installed in Audit Mode:

  * .NET Framework 3.5
  * .NET Framework 4.5.2 (KB2977302)
  * Internet Explorer 11
  * Hotfixes - 2014-09-09


  Setupcomplete / Post-install:

  * DirectX Juni 2010
  * KB890930
  * Defender Updates


[ EDITION INCLUDED ]

  * Windows 8.1 Pro VL


[ LANGUAGES ]

  * de-DE  [ German ]  
  * fr-FR  [ French ]
  * it-IT  [ Italian]


[ FEATURES ]
  
  * install.wim compressed to recovery format (install.esd)
    

[ COMMENTS & ACTIVATION INFO ]

  * Only clean installs can be made with this format, not upgrades.
  

  * A WPI-window will pop up in the last phase of the installation.
  * To Pre-Activate Windows, select "KMSpico" and "Begin Install".
  * To skip activation, just click on "Exit".   
  
  Activator:

  * KMSpico v9.2.3.0 

    
[ INSTALLATION ]

  * Create bootable USB (highly recommended), minimum 8GB, 
    with Rufus (attached) or, if you really must; burn to DVD at slow speed.
 

  Hope you will enjoy this release!

  Regards,
  Generation2
